commonInfo.introWords: Hi there! My name is Alex, i'm engineer with rich and various experience in frontend and knowledge in backend. I do what i like and like what i do. I'm passionate about logical tasks, well-quality code, product development, movies and cooking. Nice to meet you!

education.description: Math faculty of BSU - one of the best places to studying and self-growing in Belarus. I've took a good and fundamental knowledge in math, in algorithms and in basic programming. I learned how to think abstractly, how to decide new and unusual tasks and work hard.

expirience.description: Working on set of apps under https://www.net2phone.com project as lead tech developer: implementing micro-frontend architecture, created common ui library which works on both Angular and React projects, solving non standard tasks, mentoring and organizing, scrum mastering.

My friends and I were trying to create our own sophisticated app for SMM in Instagram. Minimal goal for me - learning a backend development. You can look on it in https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ohsmmmobile
My friends and I are trying to create solution to connect nutritionists with their customers.
I took part in development of capital.com, currency.com. Implemented features and solved complicated issues.

In this company I took a huge experience in development of big single page web applications. I learned how to organize code in big applications, how to build strict and extendable architecture, how to work with team and customer.
Starting point of my career. Was member of internship program then worked as junior engineer: fixed bugs, implemented small features for different projects, for example https://www.hiqo-solutions.com
